Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Exempts the purchase of certain oral hygiene products from the payment of sales tax
Summary: Exempts toothpaste, toothbrushes and dental floss from the payment of sales tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting from the payment of sales tax the purchase of oral hygiene products
